text: Navibulgar is a Bulgarian shipping company, the largest in the country, with a fleet of 70 vessels: 46 bulk carriers, 9 container vessels, 5 tanker and chemical vessels, and 10 combined tonnage vessels, including their new 30,700-tonne ship, which became a part of their fleet in June 2012. ==Acquisitions== In 2002, the company acquired Varna shipyard for $16.1 million. In May 2014, Navibulgar completed its set of modern domestically built handymax ships with a deal for a Greek-owned bulker. The vessel is named Wanderlusthttp://www.tradewindsnews.com/vessel/?id=F190543BECA49D04 and was originally ordered for design and building in 1997.http://www.tradewindsnews.com/drycargo/337810/nmb-buys-primal-bulker ==References== ==External links== * Official site Category:Shipping companies of Bulgaria Category:Transport companies established in 1892 Category:Economy of Varna Category:Transport in Varna Category:1892 establishments in Bulgaria
title: Navibulgar
